message: PDF extracted and project created successfully

project.title: Marketing Collateral Design Request
project.description: Creation of comprehensive marketing collateral for MekongBank's retail banking division to align with the 'Banking Made Simple' initiative. Includes print materials, digital assets, corporate stationery updates, and promotional items adhering to existing brand guidelines and regulatory compliance.
project.usage_rights: Work for hire: Full IP transfer to MekongBank
project.result: A complete suite of updated print and digital marketing materials ready for Q2 2026 launch.

items: Organized file structure with standard naming convention

complexity_indicators: Strict technical and file naming specifications

ai_researched_costs.software_needed: Adobe Creative Cloud (Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop), Figma Professional, Microsoft 365 Business (for PPT/Word templates)
ai_researched_costs.equipment_requirements: Color-accurate monitor (99% sRGB), High-performance workstation/laptop (16GB+ RAM), Secure cloud storage for large asset transfer (Dropbox/Google One)

market_research.comparable_rates: Upwork Cambodia Top-Rated: $35-$60/hr; Local boutique agencies: $75-$120/hr; Junior freelancers: $15-$25/hr.

adjustments.reason: Starting point for mid-to-senior freelance talent in the Phnom Penh market for 2026.
Hard difficulty due to banking regulatory compliance, high volume of technical specifications, and complex multi-asset print requirements.
Corporate premium for MekongBank due to three-tier stakeholder approval process and administrative overhead.
Normal timeline (90 days) allows for standard production cycles without rush fees.

sources: Glassdoor Cambodia Graphic Designer Salary Benchmarks
AIGA Standard Guide to Design Hours per Deliverable
Adobe Creative Cloud Individual/Teams Pricing Southeast Asia
Phnom Penh Graphic Design Community Rate Surveys
MekongBank Public Brand Guidelines (proxy for complexity analysis)
pricing.disclaimer: This estimate is based on market data projected for 2026 in Cambodia. Actual costs may vary based on specific regulatory changes in the financial sector or individual freelancer expertise. The total estimate exceeds the client's $12,000 mention slightly to account for the 'Hard' complexity and high volume of deliverables, though it remains within a negotiable range.
